lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It\'s a great way to help others have the opportunities we take for granted in the U.S.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea that my actions, however small they may be, can have a real impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes it possible for other businesses to accept money over the internet.  The government has many rules and laws about how companies like mine operate.  My job is to know these rules and make sure my company follows them.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a way to do something that is useful to another individual that is trying to make a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and operate Red Castle Games in southeast Portland.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I know how small loans can make a huge difference to a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I help non-profit legal organizations with technology and Internet projects.

lenders.name: jeff
lenders.loan_because: I find the spirit of optimism among these entrepreneurs inspiring. I'm particularly moved by those doing business in communications and graphic arts because those fields are of personal interest.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large aerospace company designing graphic communications for presentations, publications, and exhibits. In my free time I love to travel abroad to expand my knowledge of other cultures and add to my photography portfolio.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: There are people in this world who need my money more than me.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I like to.

lenders.name: philip
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children Dance

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: "It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it." - Albert Einstein
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching English as a Foreign Language abroad.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to achieve the quality of life they deserve.
lenders.occupational_info: I investigate the causes of human diseases and try to find ways to prevent and/or treat them.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I volunteered in Africa and I have seen how hard the people work, and think they deserve the right to better themselves and their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I am from the US, but am currently working on my MBA in Sweden.

lenders.name: Michael Warden
lenders.loan_because: Kiva loans are a great way to make a tangible difference in people's lives. Your money doesn't just go to a bank somewhere, but into the hands of someone who's working hard to make life better for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people redesign their life around their true passions and desires .

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: the stories of the entrepreneurs I am loaning to are compelling, and remind me of my own dreams. People need all sorts of support when they are working for themselves. If I can help someone live a dream and support their family at the same time, by loaning a small (by my standards) amount of money, then that is really pretty exciting.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a designer across many disciplines, including books, graphics and other paper products, as well as larger scale projects like buildings and urban spaces. I love to see an idea become a reality- an object I can pick up, or a place I can walk through.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: In a small way, I can relate.
lenders.occupational_info: Looking for what is next...

lenders.name: Mason
lenders.loan_because: I have the great fortune of being able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I do technical writing and editing for a non-profit health care company.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: To help others.

lenders.name: Meaghan
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to create a better life for themselves, their families, and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I create animation for a children's television show.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way for me to extend & connect with people i'd love to meet and help but would never have access to do so  - I am grateful to Kiva & think Kiva is a  fantastic vehicle - Right on!!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large law firm assisting four great attorneys - busy all day long

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the inherent worth and dignity of every person and that we are all part of an interdependent web of existence.\r\n\r\nKiva is an opportunity to respectfully share my gifts with people brave enough to build their own means of support under the most trying of circumstances.

lenders.name: Bertrand
lenders.loan_because: I believe that lending money to entrepreneurs is the best way to stimulate and improve local economies.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a civil engineer, I build roads, bridges, buildings, sewers, water systems, etc...

lenders.name: Fitz
lenders.loan_because: this is the coolest thing ever, to join together to help out our fellow men and women.

lenders.name: Mayuresh
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Shivani
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my small part to help

lenders.name: Mom & Requelle
lenders.occupation: 3rd yr University Student Single Mom of 2
lenders.loan_because: its a christmas gift for my girl Requelle. She\'s 10. She has the biggest heart I just knew she would rather give then recieve. She understands that we are lucky and that there are more people that need more then we have.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a third year University Student at the University of Winnipeg. I\'m Cree Indian & mother from Mistatawasis First Nations Saskatchewan. I consider myself very fortunate to attend university to further my education and my future opportunities to work with other First Nations women in Canada.\r\n\r\n

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who strive to do better.

lenders.name: Xavier
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people who are building their communities, since I know I\'ve been given a lot of support in my time.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research on social issues, to help people improve their ability to help each other.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are less fortunate than I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a business.

lenders.occupation: Assist to the Director of NIUST  Univ of MS
lenders.loan_because: It gives me joy.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. And a tasty way to do it.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I like helping others to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach science and math to 5th grade elementary school students, in the public school system of Utah.

lenders.name: Jzzz
lenders.loan_because: you do.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in assisting other business owners. I\'m especially interested in women who own businesses and who also raise children.  I have my own company and have two children and so I know it can be a stuggle some days and others it is extremely rewarding.  I\'m fortunate to be able to have money to loan and only hope that it will help someone else and if it helps them to become self-sufficient that is even better.
lenders.occupational_info: I do public relations for travel clients. That means that hotels, resorts, spas, tour operators, and countries hire me to promote them in US based newspapers, magazines and on television.  I have had done a lot of traveling with my work around the world.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I can not only contribute to a third world economy, but also respect the dignity of the people that live and work there.  Giving is great, but loaning without interest can be even better!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mechanical engineer

lenders.name: Anne Marie
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference to someone who really needs it!

lenders.name: Jonathan & Tammy
lenders.loan_because: Traveling is our passion and we are constantly humbled by the kindness and compassion of people all over the world.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: Small business makes America great and we should spread that over the world instead of warfare.
lenders.occupational_info: Unlike many people in the world, I no longer need to work for money.  As a retired American, I'm free to work for the things I care most about.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I love seeing how a small amount of money loaned out, repaid, and loaned out again and again can make a huge difference in so many lives.

lenders.name: The Real Estate Company
lenders.loan_because: Loaning money to assist another human being expand their ability to work for themselves and increase their quality of life seems right.
lenders.occupational_info: We assist individuals in the purchasing and selling of land, residential, commercial and investment properties on the Central Coast of California.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.occupational_info: I research new food products to see if consumers will like them before they are introduced.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: I have a small biz in the U.S. and I want to share my good fortune with others who don't necessarily have the access to the same resources that I do.  I also write a blog called Indie Fixx on which I celebrate independent artists, designers, and crafters worldwide.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to help someone who is striving to better his/her life.  It often takes so little to make a huge difference in people's lives.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: just giving back
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computers

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born somewhere with more wealth than some other places in the world.  I care about other human beings, all around the world.  And because it is pure luck that I have what I have, I want to give it to others who have worked hard for what they have.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a university in Los Angeles, California, United States.  I teach philosophy.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the work these indviduals are doing to support their families.

lenders.name: PSC 140 IR
lenders.loan_because: In our class here at Canisius College we study International Relations -- including economic development -- and we want to make a positive difference in the lives of entrepreneurs in the developing world.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: this money can make a huge difference to the success of these people's businesses.

lenders.name: John & Cecilia
lenders.loan_because: In Canada we have a lot of opportunity and we loan because we would like to try and provide others with opportunity to succeed.

lenders.name: Alejandra
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed my husband and I and I beleive it's our time to help others.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I am compassionate and feel strongly about free enterprise to eliminate poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Software.  It takes me around the world for a great new perspective on life.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Because it is my hope that this small act of help may enrich the lives of those that receive it as much as Jesus has enriched and blessed my life.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm originaly from El Salvador, and my husband is from Canada.  We have 2 beautiful and healthy children. Thanks to Kiva we can do just that!

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: geordie
lenders.loan_because: I'm an enterpreneur, and I like to help out other entrepreneur's as much as I can. I believe entrepreneur's are the people that make things happen.

lenders.loan_because: I, my family and friends all have more than enough.  We must, as a nation, begin to be more generous.  This is a start to help other have enough.
lenders.occupational_info: I was an Associate Superintendent in a fairly large Urban School District.  I retired in July to make quilts, build, spend time with my dogs and other luscious things.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate financially and need to share it with those who are not. There are so many people in the world that are struggling, and we should help them.

lenders.name: Chris

lenders.occupational_info: I design experiences for people.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I care!
lenders.occupational_info: I have a shop in which I sell books, coffee, stationery and a variety of gift items.

lenders.name: Sue Childs
lenders.loan_because: As a retired teacher I recognize that education is a life altering experience.  Teachers and students want to make change for others, even in a small way, by demonstrating social responsibility by making a loan.  My students and I opened this account almost ten years ago.  I will continue with it even though I've retired and our program is closing.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught for almost 25 years at Canadore College and helped to operate a college radio station in North Bay, Ontario, Canada.

lenders.name: anya
lenders.loan_because: It is important to think of others in this world, to care and support.
lenders.occupational_info: I am single mom and a nursing student. I am working towards a better future for me and my baby Maya.

lenders.name: Penelope
lenders.loan_because: I am and have been helped by so many people and I wanted to keep that help flow going.  My income is very low [by U.S.A. standards] but I am happy to share a part of my income with women in business.
lenders.occupational_info: My volunteer work involves tutoring elementary school children, working with the local humane society and giving automobile rides to people who normally ride the bus.

lenders.name: chris
lenders.loan_because: RU kind? yes

lenders.loan_because: The employees of SAMCO want to help entrepreneurs in less developed countries to succeed. We would like others to have the opportunity to follow in his footsteps.

lenders.name: Clay

lenders.occupational_info: It's a tough day at the office for me. I am constantly developing social skills. I am also learning how to cope with authority while questioning it. Additionally, I am learning that education is important.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: we have so few opportunities to change the world. KIVA is a great avenue to affect small changes in other's worlds.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a great credit union, I am now offically an alumn of The University of New Mexico, and I enjoy cooking. Go Lobos!!!!

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I believe that these micro-loans through the wonderful service Kiva is providing is a powerful way to help people help themselves - a way I can help others that\'s significant to each recipient.

lenders.name: Kim & Family

lenders.name: Dolores
lenders.loan_because: I know what it\'s like to have an idea but no money to put it into action.  This gives me great satisfaction to be able to help get someone else's idea put into action.

lenders.name: Vanessa

lenders.name: Sean & Shauna
lenders.occupation: Microcredit Program Associate & R & D Specialist
lenders.loan_because: Sean - I have seen firsthand the power of Microcredit and the hopelessness that poverty breeds.\r\n\r\nShauna - It will make a difference in one person\'s life and to that one person it means the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Sean - I work on various projects at the Microcredit Summit Campaign.  We plan conferences where Microfinance Institutions can learn more about outreach and best practices.  We acquire data from thousands of Microfinance Institutions around the world and compile it into the most comprehensive report on microcredit outreach.  We also provide bold goals for the microcredit industry.\r\n\r\nShauna - I work with scientists who are researching ways to help the everyday person in the medical field.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteer editor at Kiva

lenders.name: Liz

lenders.occupational_info: I am mostly retired but work part time helping people with disabilities and elderly people.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do

lenders.name: Dawn

lenders.occupational_info: I represent poor people in criminal cases ("If you cannot afford a lawyer, one will be appointed for you" - - - that's me).

Chris researches medical imaging technology.

Trista studies art and visual culture.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: More than a few have taken a chance on me and my hope at that time was that one day I would do the same for another.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I love the power the Internet gives us to share our opinions and even our money with people all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I use the Internet to help people and  companies reach out to people around the world.

lenders.name: Rabbi Adar
lenders.loan_because: "Tzedek, tzedek tirdof" -- "Justice, justice you shall pursue!"
lenders.occupational_info: I study and teach Jewish texts.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: People need to help each other, at home and across the world. This is how we can be respectful of the joys and opportunities we have as humans sharing this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the US Postal Service on the computer and technology systems. I have also worked at motorcycle repair shops, finance companies, and architect firms designing stores and houses. My favorite hobby is building guitars.

lenders.name: Clement
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with family and friends, financial and medical good health, close calls and miraculous interventions... So I owe the world...;-)

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have a chance to follow a dream, of doing it on their own -- so lend a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit at a computer screen -- and type for hours.

lenders.name: Henry
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense. It\'s easy to understand how this can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a filmmaker with in interest in social issues.

lenders.name: Jennifer & Patrick
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy seeing other people work hard and be successful.

lenders.name: Lynnwood Dennys
lenders.loan_because: The employees of Lynnwood Dennys care.
lenders.occupational_info: We are the crew of Lynnwood Dennys, which is an restaurant in Washington State US.

lenders.name: Dominic
lenders.loan_because: I believe that every little bit counts.  I\'m excited to see how these business owners around the world step up to the challenge and I will be cheering them on.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mechanical engineer.  I work for a contract company that develops products for various industries.  Some of these products include parking meters, measurement equipment, avionics, enclosures, molds, etc...

lenders.name: Manchi
lenders.loan_because: I\'ve been donating to various charities for years, I found Kiva to be innovative,  extremly easy and attractive to use.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I learned about Kiva in one of my political science classes at the University of Wisconsin-Madison. I loan because I think it is a wonderful way to make connections with other people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently in school studying politics and communications. I am hoping to pursue a career in a non-profit organization once I graduate.

lenders.name: Vegan in California
lenders.loan_because: I saw the special on PBS\' Frontline and was drawn to what I saw.  It seemed to make more sense to help other people support themselves than to buy unneeded consumer items for myself or friends and family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an agency that administers the mental health component of health care services for low income individuals receiving coverage from a county government source.  Customer service excellence is my passion!  Government bureaucracy does not have to mean cold, impersonal, slow, or uncaring and inefficient service.

lenders.name: Keun
lenders.loan_because: I always wanted to help out globally. Yes, I know there are less fortunate people here as well, but I\'ve realized that even with insignificant amount of money I can help people start their own buseinss.

lenders.name: Abe
lenders.loan_because: This is the greatest website. The difference that I can hopefully make by lending people money is exciting and rewarding.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the typical American corporation were hard work and dedication  means very little, beside that I love my job and the people who i work with.

lenders.name: Nellie
lenders.loan_because: I want these entrepreneurs to access cash without being beholden to loan sharks with exorbitant interest rates, so that they can grow their business and improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the principal investigator of a cardiovascular research group at an academic medical center. We investigate the cell and molecular mechanisms leading to heart attack and stroke.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed.I would like others to have the chance to feel empowered, and in turn, they can \"pay it forward\".
lenders.occupational_info: I teach my children to be kind and giving by setting an example for them.

lenders.name: Geoff
lenders.loan_because: A good idea,  hard work, capital and good people mixed together create opportunies no matter where you are.
lenders.occupational_info: I lend money to small businesses alongs Maine's midcoast.

lenders.name: TCU CEO
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we care. It is that simple. TCU CEO is a successful organization of student entrepreneurs that hope to assist struggling entrepreneurs in developing countries. This micro-lending initiative allows us to learn and assist at the same time.
lenders.occupational_info: TCU CEO is the student managed entrepreneurship organization at Texas Christian University in Fort Worth, Texas, USA. TCU CEO has a passion for assisting entrepreneurs in developing countries. We hope to encourage other university entrepreneurship clubs around the world to join us in partnering with KIVA. The TCU CEO microlending initiative enables students to give to the international community while learning at the same time.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.occupational_info: Sales for an online career site.\r\n\r\nI am 20 years old and I have been on my own since im 18. I have a LOT of credit card debt and I am trying not to ruin my life, I do want a house one day. I am in desperate need.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: It\'s the whole \"give a man a fish\" principal
lenders.occupational_info: The world looks much smaller from 40,000 ft.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: Knowing a small $ amount, pooled together with other like minded people, could make such a difference for someone in a difficult situation - I couldn\\\'t pass it up.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: You can only keep what you have by giving it away!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am now a buisness partner in world commerce. The diversified business people I invest with are doing good things in bringing water to those who do not have it, clothes to those who need them, and farm fresh produce to the hungry. And on the 2nd round of lending: Fishing in Samoa, Cows in Azerbijan, Pigs in Vietnam, & Chicken in Peru!
  It just reminds me that God is good all the time!

lenders.name: Carl & Marcy
lenders.loan_because: This is just a great program to be a part of.  It's that simple

lenders.name: scott
lenders.loan_because: Ambitious, hard working people deserve a chance!

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I understand how hard it is to get the first bit of capital needed to get your business off the ground.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell heavy construction equipment made in Japan.

lenders.name: Arthur
lenders.loan_because: where would I be without the help and blessings I have received along my way in life, I need to do some payback.
lenders.occupational_info: I help schedule the products (lawn mowers) that the company I work for makes and then sells

lenders.name: Rey
lenders.occupational_info: Power plant operator

lenders.name: St Alphonsus School
lenders.loan_because: we are called by our faith to serve others.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a Catholic elementary school

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I feel I should walk the talk.
lenders.occupational_info: When people have problems with their computers, I fix it. When businesses have problems with their big computers, I fix it.

lenders.name: nancy
lenders.loan_because: In 1964-65, I was a Peace Corps teacher in Kenya in the first group to go to East Africa.  I taught English, history, and art to girls in a secondary school in Misikhu, near Broderick Falls and 35 miles from Kitale and Eldoret.  One of those girls became minister of agriculture in the \'90s; about the others, I know nothing.  But I saw at first hand what a difference education can make in the lives of women, and therefore men.  \r\n\r\nI also saw what it meant to live by subsistance farming--having barely enough to eat and no cash at all.  I hope that loans such as this one can help people in Kenya make their way to financial security for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I believe in sharing and helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Doing my best to leave things in a better condition than that in which they were found.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: The show on TV really touched me.  I picked Ivy because we are in the same buisness and I know how hard it is to stay open.
lenders.occupational_info: I amd the owner of a hair salon in Kansas City Missouri and I run the day to day buisness operations

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: I love entrepreneurship and will do what I can to foster that spirit worldwide.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I want to support anyone who wants to support themselves, whether it be my family, friends, or anyone around the world through Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: Simply put, I help companies protect their information and their customers\' information from people who shouldn\'t have it. This involves lots of computers, documentation, and long, boring meetings, but I like it and it allows me to live in London (currently) and travel to India and Africa.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I  have been so Blessed in my life.  It is so rewarding to be able to help others in their endeavors.

lenders.name: Cari
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I believe capitalism helps people by promoting freedom, self-worth, happiness, wealth and democracy.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in people and businesses with high growth potential.

lenders.name: Our family
lenders.loan_because: It is a way for our family to impact lives of those wishing to work to change their own lives
lenders.occupational_info: Businessman husband, jewelry designer wife, 2 high school children (one is on loan to us as an AFS student) and 1 middle school student

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I admire initiative, energy, and creativity in people.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer on Boards of Directors that assist in providing affordable housing for the elderly

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I felt personally inspired to do my part for struggling people in strugglng nations. How can I have so much and not care for those who don\'t. \"Because I have been given much I too must give.\"
lenders.occupational_info: Student at a University

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes we all need a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a wonderful job as a legal assistant.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: In honor of my grandmother for Christmas 06.  God has supplied her with all she needs and this will please her more than any other gift I could give.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a soldier in the war on pestilence!\r\nPlumbers help protect the health of nations!

lenders.name: Donald

lenders.occupational_info: Desire to 'finish strong' by helping others in the name of Christ.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I lend because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a a non-profit consultancy in New York. We work in resource-dependent to promote the management of natural resource revenues for the public good.

lenders.name: 7 Land Park Women
lenders.occupation: 5 educators, a realtor, and a manager

lenders.name: lisa
lenders.loan_because: If I can help someone in some small way that makes a wonderful difference in their lives....then I will do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist and I do catering occaisionally.  I also make specialty cakes for specail occaisions.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: T.V. and Film acting

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: It\'s the best way to help people in the world without charges.\r\nIt\'s one of the major role of the internet.\r\nMake relations between distant guys

lenders.name: Johan

lenders.occupational_info:
I make images and music and films that hopefully will make other people stop and think.

i am sharing my music to others: myspace.com/Latki
animations: youtube.com/JohanLatki

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to make a living with dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer in a store that sells fairly traded crafts made by artisans from over 35 countries.

lenders.name: Jennifer & Fremont
lenders.loan_because: It's a very small world.

lenders.name: Kristan & Family
lenders.loan_because: We received a gift certificate.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: People outside the U.S. need help a lot more than us Americans need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help clean up the environment by cleaning up hazardous waste sites.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: If you think you're too small to make a difference try sleeping in a closed room with a mosquito, or give kiva.org a try.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I feel it\'s my moral responsibility.  People helping people...I LOVE IT.  You don\'t have to be a celebrity with lots of money to help someone.  I can\'t afford much, but what I can give I do with all my heart.  I feel blessed and wish the same for you.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a union that represents trade workers.  Basically, I do all the adminstrative things necessary in an office, whether it\'s paying bills, reconciling accounts, typing letters, etc.

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a writer and editor.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteer.

lenders.name: Our Family
lenders.loan_because: We have all been blessed to have lived in Canada in peace, in prosperity and have a wealth of food and needs being met. We want to share.
lenders.occupational_info: We are agricultural specialitsts, engineer, teachers, retired Christian Minister, lay Christian ministers, home-makers, farmers, IT persons, students

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel and help at my church.

lenders.name: Nico
lenders.loan_because: I have a deep desire to make the place we call home, better.
lenders.occupational_info: I optimize and develop new products. I specifically do research in the pharmaceutical industry.

lenders.name: MARLITO
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in the Philippines and have seen first hand the living conditions that many impoverished people live in. I also know that most are willing to work hard to improve their life, especially the lives of their children, if only given that \"ONE CHANCE\". I know that most people in the world believe that everyone deserves a shot at being happy, and that most are willing to lend a helping hand to our fellow man. I believe in the old saying, \"Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day. Teach a man to fish and he will eat for a lifetime.\"
lenders.occupational_info: I am a pediatric nurse working with children who have cancer or heart conditions in a hospital setting. There is too much suffering in the world, and we can all do well by lessening it through wonderful organizations like Kiva.

lenders.name: Chris Stewart
lenders.loan_because: After I listened to the Venture Voice podcast featuring Kiva, I was overjoyed because I have been waiting for a site like this to go online for years. Micro-finance is an incredible tool in the eradication of poverty and uplifting of individual self-worth and dignity. It\ is a personal honor to contribute time and resources to this cause.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business intelligence developer at a mid-size Texas-based insurance company located in the DFW Metroplex. Being a part of Kiva fits in perfectly with my desire to help others by empowering them to help themselves.

lenders.name: Larry & Joyce
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others improve themselves and educate their children.  Also to help women become independent.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping others to become teachers.

lenders.name: Michael & Kim
lenders.loan_because: we are blessed to be a blessing

lenders.name: Michael Ezell
lenders.loan_because: The only thing people want to do, after having their needs met, is to make a difference. Investment in the wellbeing of another is an investment in one's own wellbeing.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to get fit and healthy. I also show them how to help others to meet their fitness goals and earn a profit in the process.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I am a brother to everyone on the planet and am can think of no greater joy than to help and lift others.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people learn to communicate better, and influence change in a way that improves companies, families, communities, nations and lives.

lenders.name: Higginbothams
lenders.loan_because: The best way to help someone to gain financial independence is to give them the tools to succeed, not a handout-a helping hand. Our family loves to  lend!

lenders.name: Scott & Julie
lenders.loan_because: Muhammad Yunus and Grameen Bank have shown that it works.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Visiting Professor who teaches business ethics. My wife is a technology coordinator for a public school

lenders.name: Mike & Deb C.
lenders.loan_because: hard-working people everywhere deserve a chance to have a better life.

lenders.name: Juliette
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people become independent, here or outside of the country. I help people with HIV here in salt Lake City, but I think my dollar can go much further elsewhere (since I am not Bill Gates ! )
lenders.occupational_info: I am independently employed as a freelance writer for Sewing publications in the USA

lenders.name: Ron & Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help from their friends, the wealth should be shared
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people write stories about their life

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: The scary clowns under my bed make me.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I love business!

lenders.name: Fergie
lenders.loan_because: People need working capital
lenders.occupational_info: I own a food processing company

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help eliminate poverty, and change lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Sell food to Restuarants.

lenders.name: Gerrit
lenders.loan_because: This is my small contribution to bring more love to this world
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the reception of a hotel, at night, to review charges, enter reservations into the database, prepare invoices to tour operators, check in/out clients, close shift/day, statistics, archive

lenders.name: Neil  McKibben
lenders.loan_because: I am the future

lenders.name: The Pigott Family
lenders.loan_because: Having been to Africa, we know a little goes a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: We work to inform the next generation that even one person can make a great difference.

lenders.name: Sterling
lenders.loan_because: After someone hit me over the head and made me realize that such a small amount of my money could help someone else so much, I had to.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that each of us deserves a chance to improve our lives. My hope is to help someone like myself: a single mom working hard to support her child(ren).
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office and export food products to other countries. The best part of my job is communicating with people all over the world.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: It is uplifting to support the hard work and determination of those who are overcoming hardship and challenges much greater than I have experienced.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a manager of technology for a large office products retailer that has businesses in North America, Europe, Asia and South America

lenders.name: Rob and Carrie
lenders.loan_because: it\'s an opportunity to share Christ\'s love by helping others.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I'm not rich is an understatement but I certainly feel blessed and fortunate so I'm happy to help someone less fortunate to realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently a self employed drywall man, painter, and general handyman. I hope to start a small green building company specializing in earthbag construction. Eventually I'd like to go to areas affected by hurricanes, earthquakes, etc. to help build these structures.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Our Giving Tree
lenders.loan_because: I am Jeunesse's mother. I loaned in her name because she is a wonderful daughter who has given so many others so much of her time and love. Especially me. So this is in her honor.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others and hope to do my part in making the world a better place to live.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach volunteers at an aquarium about marine life and ocean conservation.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: it feels great to help someone, and to appreciate my blessings.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.  I also believe that thriving economies for all will be the only path to global peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I recently retired from a position where I facilitated training programs and job opportunities for people who were unemployed or underemployed.  Presently I am starting my own business, a small cafe collocated with my son's coffee roasting business

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to add a little positive energy.... giving business a jump start.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my little part in this world to plant a seed and show others that there are people who care about their well-being.

lenders.name: Margie & Michael
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our blessings
lenders.occupational_info: We are both business owners that work long and hard to serve our customers.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I little bit can help another in volumes.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to make the dreams of others possible.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference as I have been blessed to live in Canada.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage infrastructure programs that provide funding to British Columbian communities for their water, sewer, roads, etc. projects.

lenders.name: dena
lenders.loan_because: I care and want to help.

lenders.name: dena
lenders.loan_because: i want to help countries and people who are willing to try to make a difference in their lives.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I started my business with a partner 15 years ago and understand how hard the process can be, even when you have access to some capital.  Micro lending is a great way to help people that really want to achieve.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: People lent money to me to start a company when I needed the money.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with entrepreneurs, helping them to become more successful.

lenders.name: Sage
lenders.loan_because: I want to reach out and touch another hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend sixth grade. I am very good at writing and enjoy learning about science. I hope to be the first Asian  President of the United States.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.occupational_info: My sole purpose in being a \"professional dancer\" is to present the art of movement on stage, create dances in a rehearsal studio, teach school students the art of expressing themselves through creative movement, to travel around the world performing selected pieces that are unique to the way in which society views particular issues and (for myself) to do what I have ALWAYS dreamed of being, doing and pursuing!!

lenders.name: Jascha Narveson
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a good idea!
lenders.occupational_info: i'm currently working on a PhD in music composition.

lenders.name: Ketchum-Watson Group
lenders.loan_because: In honor of two of our colleagues; to honor their spirit of giving.

lenders.name: Joe & Shannon
lenders.occupational_info:
Joe: I research medical devices used to look at the heart.
Shannon: I work as a physical therapist. I help people with joint or muscle problems.

lenders.name: Michael&Kaysu&Leo&Philip
lenders.loan_because: microfinance and entrepreneurs - a great idea
lenders.occupational_info: A system administrator takes care of the computers and networking equipment that makes a company run. I work for a small department so I am a generalist in that I work on many different kinds of issues.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: It's sane and humane.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with teenagers in the public library.

lenders.name: Jayne
lenders.loan_because: I like to help any willing to work!

lenders.name: francis
lenders.loan_because: I believe in self reliance, and I enjoy helping people attain it.

lenders.name: Tiska
lenders.loan_because: I live in abundance as an American and I want to help others who weren\'t born to the privilege that I was.  I am not financially wealthy, but still want to share.  I love connecting to these folks who are working to make things better for themselves and others.
lenders.occupational_info: I want to express a spiritual essence through art and my life.  I want to communicate with the use of colored pencils, sumi-e ink, and acrylic paints.  I want to experience with others the meaning of serentity.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the concept of giving people opportunity
lenders.occupational_info: I run a company that manufactures theatrical stage drapery and theatre rigging and hire many women and minorities

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to make a difference. I have told my students about it and many  are getting involved themselves. Life is too short not to do some good when you can. And, it makes you feel great!

lenders.name: Tiago Alves
lenders.loan_because: I feel good about it and because during my MBA at the University of San Francisco we had Kiva's President as a guest and I  recorded his presentation for my podcast.
lenders.occupational_info: Promoting HP OpenCall Services around the world.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Because, to help someone help themselves is the right thing to do...
lenders.occupational_info: I make medicines to help treat or cure diseases

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: I give because I believe in the power of giving. I am fortunate and I want to share my fortunes with others who need them and want to use them to enrich their community.
lenders.occupational_info: The company I work for helps workers find resources for childcare, eldercare, education etc.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: Before retiring I worked for a non-profit that trained and loaned money to low income women entrepreneurs in my area. Kiva provides me the opportunity to continue helping entrepreneurs in need.

lenders.name: Katina
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need.
lenders.occupational_info: Redeveloping an urban area (downtown Boise  Idaho, USA) by creating housing and jobs.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of business to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: SHIRAZ
lenders.loan_because:
I care and I can. So little means so much to people in developing countries.  

Friends viewing this page who are unfamiliar with Kiva: Please note that the beauty of micro-finance donations is in that your "seed donation money" can be used to help more than the original recipient. Once the short-term loan is paid back into your Kiva account, you can re-loan the money to someone else in need. Unlike other "conventional" forms of charitable donation, this is truly a gift that keeps on giving.

lenders.name: Jefferey
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I have supported a number of worthwhile international charities.  However, Kiva.org seems like it offers of the most efficient way to support people in need and who are willing to help themselves, their families and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide legal services to entrepreneurs and growth-oriented businesses.

lenders.name: Stern, Elkind & Curray
lenders.loan_because: We firmly believe that given a chance everyone can excel in whatever they choose to do.  We\'d like to provide that chance to as many individuals as possible...

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy and exciting and real way of helping. It also draws my attention to other parts of the world.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people around the world!

lenders.name: Raymond Chiu
lenders.loan_because: i care.
lenders.occupational_info: life insurance salesman

lenders.name: Muching
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the Clinton Foundation HIV/AIDS Initiative, where I work on building capacity in the health systems of developing countries

lenders.name: Tony Dawson
lenders.loan_because: A small loan can add value to products and quality to lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I grow certified organic Ambrosia apples.

lenders.name: Preeti
lenders.loan_because: I\'m just amazed by the buzz surrounding microlending.  It\'s a wonderful idea and its results are impressive.  I just wanted to join in and be part of it all.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an organization that provides free legal services to indigent parents involved with the child welfare system.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people will succeed when given a chance.  I loan because I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I make stories to entertain, raise questions and have fun.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great idea. I run the parent association at my child\'s school and we gave each class money to donate to Kiva.It is wonderful to get the children involved and teach them how to make a difference.

lenders.name: Sanjay
lenders.loan_because: I can and should

lenders.name: james
lenders.occupational_info: dudes

lenders.name: Michelle & Mason
lenders.loan_because: This was something that we chose to do in lieu of wedding favors. We wanted to find a way to help people.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans seem to work far better than large internationally financed loans.
lenders.occupational_info: A mix of business, art, travel.

lenders.name: Cathleen
lenders.loan_because: It's a no brainer way to make a huge difference in people's lives and developing communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with web sites to either help create them or improve them.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: ....it is my sense that one of the most powerful gifts we are provided in this life is the gift of creation. We create sand castles, we create new technologies, we create families…we often even create perfect screw-ups.  Loaning to motivated people all over the globe provides each of us an individualized opportunity to allow others to create new lives for themselves while they in turn make a huge difference in their local communities. By providing others the chance to create they create new situations that ultimately will benefit others – countless entrepreneurs, countless possibilities – all of this enabled by microfinance…sounds like a good reason to loan.

lenders.name: Andre
lenders.loan_because: I am amazed by fellow entrepreneurs from all over the world and admire their courage and persistence
lenders.occupational_info: I design, build and monetize great consumer internet experiences

lenders.name: Clare
lenders.loan_because: I think we need to unite humanity and help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I help provide housing to those who wouldn't be able to afford it otherwise.

lenders.name: Ty1720
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to need money to succeed in a business and have been poor before.
lenders.occupational_info: I cut grass, trim bushes, trees and install new plants for homes and businesses.

lenders.name: Beatrice
lenders.loan_because: ..it's the right thing to do and it's a working solution in action.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a small biotech company developing tests to detect nasty bacteria

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I understand how hard it is to raise money to finace your own business and to just get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I design apron patterns. I purchase fabric and cut out the designs and sew the aprons on a machine. I sell the finished aprons on the internet.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.occupational_info: software user interface design.

lenders.name: Tomasz
lenders.loan_because: I believe that stimulating entrepreneurship is the right way to help developing countries. Oh - and it feels nice :)
lenders.occupational_info: I study computer science, I tried a couple of my own bussinesses, I\'m a member of AIESEC.
